job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'trainen van AI-modellen' directly refers to the process of creating and refining machine learning models.

job_tasks.phrase: te helpen bij het trainen van generatieve AI-modellen
job_tasks.justification: This phrase explicitly mentions assisting in the training of generative AI models, which is a core aspect of modeling.

job_tasks.phrase: Het maken en beantwoorden van vragen met betrekking tot informatica om AI-modellen te helpen trainen.
job_tasks.justification: Creating and answering computer science-related questions to help train AI models falls under the umbrella of model development and refinement.

job_tasks.phrase: Het evalueren en rangschikken van code die door AI-modellen wordt gegenereerd.
job_tasks.justification: Evaluating and ranking AI-generated code is a method of providing feedback to improve the model's performance, a key part of the modeling lifecycle.

job_tasks.phrase: ervaren software-engineer die zijn of haar expertise in codering wil inzetten
job_tasks.justification: The mention of 'software engineer' and 'expertise in coding' points to the software development aspect of the role.

soft_skills.phrase: Er is geen eerdere ervaring met AI vereist.

classification.rationale: The job description focuses on providing human feedback to train existing AI models, rather than designing, developing, or fine-tuning them. While it mentions generative AI, the core tasks are about evaluation and answering questions to aid training, which doesn't align with the core responsibilities of a GenAI Engineer.
